const response = await client.search({
  index: "cooking_blog",
  query: {
    bool: {
      must: [
        {
          term: {
            tags: "vegetarian",
          },
        },
        {
          range: {
            rating: {
              gte: 4.5,
            },
          },
        },
      ],
      should: [
        {
          term: {
            category: "Main Course",
          },
        },
        {
          multi_match: {
            query: "curry spicy",
            fields: ["title^2", "description"],
          },
        },
        {
          range: {
            date: {
              gte: "now-1M/d",
            },
          },
        },
      ],
      must_not: [
        {
          term: {
            "category.keyword": "Dessert",
          },
        },
      ],
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
